original_title: The Best of Christopher Daniels: Heaven Sent, Hell Bound
overview: One of the dominant forces in TNA's X Division, The "Fallen Angel" fancies himself as "God's gift to wrestling". While this thinking may be a bit arrogant, there is no denying the fact that Christopher Daniels is one of the most decorated athletes in wrestling today. The self-proclaimed "Mr. TNA" has taken the X Division to a new level with his no-nonsense, take-no-prisoners attitude. For any fan of the star, this is truly the wrestling gospel according to "The Fallen Angel" Christopher Daniels.
title: The Best of Christopher Daniels: Heaven Sent, Hell Bound
